name: MICROOMS
description:
MICROOMS is a game set in the Backrooms universe, where everything feels familiar and unsettling at the same time. Currently containing 3 Levels [Level 0 to Level 2]

The game is currently in Early Access, and I don't guarantee the game will be continued

CONTROLS:
W - Forward
A - Left
S - Backwards
D - Right
E - Interact

Oh, you wonder why the game is called MICROOMS? Micro - Rooms, small rooms, the rooms are pretty tiny
